title: SRK-Gauri To Anushka-Virat, The Bachchan’s Grand Diwali Party Was Packed With Star Power!
text:
Diwali is one of the most celebrated festivals across the country, and as part of the celebrations, people get together to party and kick off the festivities together.

Just like all of us, Bollywood stars organise Diwali parties too. From Kapoors to Bachchans, this year as well many B-Town stars hosted Diwali bash and they were all star-studded events. Everyone got dressed in their ethnic best to set the festive mood right.

Instagram

The Bachchans hosted Diwali party after two years and as expected it was packed with star power! From Shah Rukh Khan-Gauri, Anushka Sharma-Virat Kohli, Akshay Kumar-Twinkle Khan to Katrina Kaif and Ambanis, everyone was glittering in their ethnic attires.

Take a look!

The Bachchans didn’t celebrate Diwali for last two years after Aishwarya Rai Bachchan’s father Krishnaraj Rai passed away in 2017 and Shweta's father-in-law Rajan Nanda died in 2018.
description: The Bachchans hosted Diwali party after two years and as expected it was packed with star power! From Shah Rukh Khan-Gauri, Anushka Sharma-Virat Kohli, Akshay Kumar-Twinkle Khan to Katrina Kaif and Ambanis, everyone was glittering in their ethnic attires.
